Welcome

This documentation provides a complete reference for the warhouse API, a universal warehouse management system designed to handle any type of product storage and tracking.

Endpoints Available

  • Products - Manage product catalog.
  • Warehouses - Manage storage locations.
  • Inventory - Track stock levels and minimum thresholds.

Getting Started

  1. Use Postman or curl to test endpoints.
  2. Create a product, warehouse, and inventory entry.
  3. Explore filters, relations, and error responses.
